STATE
v.
Alvin Terrill FOSTER, Jr. No. 104PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 28, 2004. John G. Barnwell, Assistant Attorney General, G. Dewey Hudson, District Attorney, for State. George E. Kelly, III, Raleigh, for Foster. Seth H. Jaffe, Raleigh, for ACLU.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th day of July 2004 by American Civil Liberties Union for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 28th day of July 2004."
